title: NHK.The.Truth.Behind.the.Chain.of.Meltdowns.720p.HDTV.x264.AAC
description:
The Truth Behind the Chain of Meltdowns

Sociopolitical Documentary hosted by Yoshihiro Nemoto, published by NHK in 2012 - English narration
 <a href="
http://docuwiki.net/images/5/59/The-Truth-Behind-the-Chain-of-Meltdowns-Cover.jpg" rel="nofollow" target="_NEW">
http://docuwiki.net/images/5/59/The-Truth-Behind-the-Chain-of-Meltdowns-Cover.jpg</a>

Information
------------------------------

A year and four months since the accident, much remains unclear about what really happened at the Fukushima Daiichi Nuclear Power Plant. We home in on the answers using the latest simulations and hearing testimonies of people who were there.
